alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Kinney; Real; Uvalde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 5:55PM CDT until June 21 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kinney County in south central Texas... Northwestern Uvalde County in south central Texas... South central Edwards County in south central Texas... Real County in south central Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 555 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rio Frio to near Camp Wood to 10 miles west of Barksdale, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leakey, Camp Wood, Laguna, Barksdale, Tuff, Rio Frio, Concan, Vance, Montell, Cline, Garner State Park, Reagan Wells, Knippa, Lost Maples State Natural Area and Turkey Mountain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
